title: Zeroes
text: Think about what values would cause the function to be equal to zero.

title: Domain
text: When determining domain, solve for any undefined values, such as when the denominator is equal to zero.

title: Range
text: Think about the maximum and minimum of f(x) as $$x$$ approaches $$4$$ and $$-4$$.
